options.text: Add this block to show a collection of your blog posts on any page. It automatically retrieves and lists all published blog posts.

Name of the pricing plan. Shown at the top of the card.

options.placeholder: For small businesses and indie hackers

meta.note: Price and term for the pricing plan. (ie `$199/mo`)
Badge that displays at the top of the pricing plan card to add helpful context.

Add highlighted border around the pricing plan to make it stand out.

Larger main headline for this page section.

Controls how the content block is positioned on the page. Choose "Left" to align the block against the left margin or "Center" to position the block in the middle of the page. This setting affects the entire content block's placement, not the text alignment within it.

options.text: Form submissions are configured to be read-only for data integrity reasons. But they are a great candidate for use in [Flows](/admin/settings/flows). Directus Flows is a drag and drop, low-code automation builder to simplify tasks like automatic notifications or sending incoming requests to third party services. Learn more about Flows.

meta.note: Action after successful submission.
Text shown on submit button.
Message shown after successful submission.

options.placeholder: Thanks for reaching out! We'll be in touch soon.

meta.note: Form name (for internal reference).
Destination URL after successful submission.
Form structure and input fields
Received form responses.
Show or hide this form from the site.
Setup email notifications when forms are submitted.
Add an email address and press enter. To use a form field as the email address use merge tags `{# #}` (e.g. `{# email #}.
Email subject line. You can use merge tags like this `Hi {# first-name #}`.
Include a message for the email body. To merge form responses use merge tags with the field name like `{# first-name #}`.

options.text: Create custom forms by adding and configuring your desired input fields below. No coding required.
This table displays all responses submitted through this form. Each entry includes the submission timestamp and the values for each form field.
Set up automatic emails to notify your team members when forms are submitted, or send confirmation receipts to people who complete your forms.

options.text: Globals are settings that are applied across your entire site. Globals use what we call a `singleton` collection type. Learn more about globals and singletons.
Be careful about changing the access policies and permissions for the `globals` collection so that you don't expose your private API keys.
